1.title: Dragon Boat
1.plot: Cleveland celebrated the Dragon Boat Festival, with 22 teams competing to win. OCA Image TV has two episodes covering of the festival.

2.title: Dragon Boat Part II
2.plot: Cleveland celebrated the Dragon Boat Festival, with 22 teams competing to win.

3.title: The Rise of AsiaTown
3.plot: It's about what Cleveland has to offer; it shows lots of food from the festival, egg roll, samosa, and sushi eating contests; the interviews talk about universities, hospitals, minimal traffic, metro parks, bike trails, golf courses, restaurants, sports venues, orchestra, art museum, Cleveland being welcoming to newcomers, Global Cleveland helping newcomers looking to live, work and start businesses, Ohio City, near West Side district, near East side district, Asia Plaza, Cleveland's medical environment/history, St. Vincent Charity Hospital.

4.title: Cleveland Business Culture and What It Offers to Immigrants
4.plot: This episode is about Cleveland's business culture; it shows the CAF vendors (minus health pavilion, the grand opening of Ariel International Center, the TiE awards ceremony, and CREW event; the interviews talk about boating, fishing, hunting, skiing, biking, tennis, golf, museums, orchestra, the closeness of Akron, Cleveland Clinic and their wellness programs, the warmth of the Midwest (people willing to help each other), good education, the good quality of Lake Erie, Cleveland's medical electronics and imaging industry, Cleveland's health care, insurance, and ...

5.title: Cleveland Culture Display IU
5.plot: All cultural performances with martial art, Instant Noodles performance, CAF performances (Chinese, Japanese, Indian, Hawaiian, Vietnamese, Filipino and other), Lion Dance, Dragon Dance

2.title: Asian Weddings
2.plot: IMAGE TV OHIO is an outreach initiative from OCAGC, hoping to be self-sustain, a High Energy Magazine-styled 30 minutes Television show. IMAGE TV OHIO will focus on local Asian Pacific American cultural diversity and prospective on Economic, Social, Arts and Cultural Development. The show will provide the community at large a better understanding of Asian culture. Each episode will include segments on a variety of diverse topics related to economic, education, culture, traditions, food, health and beauty, fashion, sports, arts and entertainment, news, and current ...

4.title: Asia Town
4.plot: A brief about where to go when visiting Cleveland.

1.title: Future of Asia Town
1.plot: Cleveland's Asian Town and the first ever Cleveland Asian Festival and its success.

2.title: Future of Asia Town Part II
2.plot: Cleveland's Asian Town and its future.

3.title: Future of Asia Town Part III
3.plot: Cleveland's Asian Town and its future.

4.title: Instant Noodles Interview
4.plot: OCA Image TV Producer Kyle Znamanak interviewing Instant Noodles Dance Crew during the 2012 Cleveland Asian Festival that was held on May 19-20, 2012.

5.title: Chung-Fu Chang Performance with Verb Ballets
5.plot: Verb Ballets presented an evening of work by Chung-Fu Chang on February 23, 2013 at 8PM at the Breen Center for the Performing Arts in Ohio City. Chang danced with Cloudgate Dance Theatre and Kaohsiung Contemporary Dance Company. His works have been performed nationally and internationally. OCA Image TV had a chance to interview him before the show.

cast.name: Chapter, Japanese American Citizens League Cleveland

imdb.plot outline: IMAGE TV OHIO is a self-sustain High energy Television show. It will be a Magazine Show with a focus on local Asian-American culture, traditions, customs and their influences. The show will include 30 minutes of programming that will provide Ohioans with a better understanding of the various Asian cultures in our area. Each episode will include segments on a variety of diverse topics related to education, culture, traditions, food, health and beauty, fashion, sports, arts and entertainment, news, and current issues as well as upcoming events. IMAGE TV OHIO will cover topics of interest to Asian Pacific Americans in Northeast Ohio and surrounding areas and will include cultures from China, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Japan, Korea, Laos, Cambodia, Philippines, Singapore, Sri Lanka, Taiwan, Thailand, and Vietnam.
imdb.title: OCA Image TV
plot: An award winning self-sustain High energy Television show focusing on local Asian-American culture, traditions, customs and their influences in Northeast Ohio.::Anonymous

IMAGE TV OHIO is a self-sustain High energy Television show. It will be a Magazine Show with a focus on local Asian-American culture, traditions, customs and their influences. The show will include 30 minutes of programming that will provide Ohioans with a better understanding of the various Asian cultures in our area. Each episode will include segments on a variety of diverse topics related to education, culture, traditions, food, health and beauty, fashion, sports, arts and entertainment, news, and current issues as well as upcoming events. IMAGE TV OHIO will cover topics of interest to Asian Pacific Americans in Northeast Ohio and surrounding areas and will include cultures from China, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Japan, Korea, Laos, Cambodia, Philippines, Singapore, Sri Lanka, Taiwan, Thailand, and Vietnam.::Znamenak, Kyle
